sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { UserService } from '../services/user.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import Vlasnik from '../models/vlasnik'; import Dekorater from '../models/dekorater'; @Component({ selector: 'app-spiskovi', templateUrl: './spiskovi.component.html', styleUrls: ['./spiskovi.component.css'] }) export class SpiskoviComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private servis:UserService,private ruter:Router) { } vlasnici:Vlasnik[]=[] dekorateri:Dekorater[]=[] ngOnInit(): void { this.servis.dohvatiVlasnike().subscribe( vlasnik=>{ this.vlasnici=vlasnik } ) this.servis.dohvatiDekoratere().subscribe( dekor=>{ this.dekorateri=dekor } ) } } Početna Stranica
